about_the_game:
You heard rumors about strange happenings in a factory and decided to sneak in through the vents.
You must explore and escape the factory, relying solely on a flashlight while avoiding 'He' in the deep darkness.
If you let your guard down, 'He' will rush towards you from the darkness.

Game Objective

In a factory full of deep darkness, rely on your flashlight to explore and escape while avoiding 'He'.
Be cautious. If you let your guard down, 'He' will appear right in front of you. Never let your guard down and stay alert at all times.

Exploration and Escape

There may be hints scattered throughout the factory that provide information about it. Find these hints while exploring the factory.
Once you have finished exploring, escape the factory! The exit is likely the main door at the center of the factory, blocked by shutters. Find a way to open it.

Flashlight

The flashlight is your only source of light and your sole companion in the pitch-black darkness.
The flashlight's battery automatically replenishes, allowing unlimited use. But what will happen if 'He' sees the light from your flashlight?

CCTV

You can view various parts of the factory through CCTV cameras.
CCTV can be accessed from monitors in the control room, but if the power is cut, you won't be able to see anything.
Use CCTV to track 'He’s' movements and avoid him as you navigate the factory.

'He'

'He' roams the factory, wielding an axe. You must explore and escape while avoiding him.
If you let your guard down, 'He' will rush towards you from the darkness with his axe.

Controls

Move with "WASD", sprint with "Shift", and crouch with "CTRL".
Interact with objects using the "E" key, such as opening doors or picking up items.
Toggle the flashlight with the "F" key, and refer to the Flashlight section for details.
Pause the game with "ESC" or "P".

Good luck!

short_description: You will be in a factory filled with deep darkness, and you will have to explore and escape the factory relying on a flashlight while avoiding 'He'. 'He' will rush towards you with an axe in the darkness when he spots you. Will you be able to safely explore and escape this factory?
supported_languages: English, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
